name: bac
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
short for
baccalaureate : an exam in several subjects taken in the last year of school around the age of 18 in France and some other countries: One problem with adopting the French bac for England is that they have a different system for university. Wales now has its own bacc.
More examplesFewer examplesI was doing my bac and studying hard.The Welsh Bacc is an educational qualification delivered in secondary schools and colleges across Wales, which is designed to be broader than traditional syllabuses.
